TEXT: Please call Stella.  Ask her to bring these things with her from the store:  Six spoons of fresh snow peas, five thick slabs of blue cheese, and maybe a snack for her brother Bob.  We also need a small plastic snake and a big toy frog for the kids.  She can scoop these things into three red bags, and we will go meet her Wednesday at the train station.

TRANSCRIPTION: p l iː z k ɑː l s t ɪ ɹ ɐ æ s h ɚ t ʊ b ɹ ɪ ŋ v ɪ z f ɪ ŋ w ɪ f ɜː f ɹ ʌ m v ɪ s t ɔː s ɪ k s p uː n z ʌ v f ɹ ɛ t s s ə n d oʊ p i z f æ f ɪ k s l æ v ʌ f b l uː k ɪ z æ n d m eɪ b iː ɐ s n eɪ k f ɔːɹ h ɜː b ɹ ʌ ɾ ɚ b ɑː b w iː ɔː l s oʊ n eɪ m n ɐ s m ɔː l p l æ s t ɪ k s n eɪ k æ n ɐ b ɪ ɡ t ɜː f ɹ ɔ ɡ f ɔːɹ v ɪ k ɪ d z ʃ iː k æ n s k uː p v ɪ z f ɪ ŋ ɪ n d t ʊ f ɹ iː ɹ ɛ d b æ ɡ z æ n d w iː w ɪ l ɡ oʊ m eɪ t h ɚ w ɛ n z d eɪ æ t v ɪ t ɹ ɪ n s t eɪ ʃ ə n
